name: Among Me
description:
AMONG ME Can you tell the difference between your past self and an impostor? Try it for yourself in this game where your only enemy is YOU! You are stuck in a time travel loop!

The game only takes 10 seconds to play in objective time! The game only takes 10 seconds to play in objective time!The game only takes 10 seconds to play in objective time!The game only takes 10 seconds to play in objective time!The game only takes 10 seconds to play in objective time!The game only takes 10 seconds to play in objective time!The game only takes 10 seconds to play in objective time!

But the subjective experience might be different :P

A ludum dare 47 entry! Catoolo helped me with the drawings :)

CONTROLS
A-S / <-, ->
LEFT / RIGHT
W / UP
JUMPS / DOWN
ENTER DOORS
SPACESTAB
